data.description:
Hello players!
Table Party is a party game in which you can compete by playing 13 types of board games and casual games together.
Play with your friends and family and enjoy a great and warm time.

Included
🎮10 types of board games: One card, Yacht Dice, Othello, Chess, Checkers, Rummy, Gin Rummy, Yut Nori, Omok, Janggi
🎮3 types of causal games : Stack Up, Flying Arrow, Whack a Mole

Features
✅ It provides single play against AI and multi-play with up to 4 players.
✅ You can choose quick matching or join party.
✅ Create a party and invite friends using a four-digit invitation code
✅ Meta account avatar support: Show off your unique style with your Meta account avatar!
✅Win with a high score and record my score on the global leaderboard.
✅ Within this year, beloved licensed board games will be added.

Now Updates!! :  Party Room and Community Room:
- Party Room: This dedicated space lets you hang out with your friends before diving into a game. Use voice chat to discuss and pick the perfect game for your party.
- Community Room: Up to 8 players can gather and play! Play with interactive props, score goals at basketball games, or challenge your friends to play darts.

We're constantly working to make Table Party the best place to hang out and have fun with friends in VR.
This update is just the beginning, and we can't wait to see what kind of parties you create!

[Join us]. We invite you to join us on the official Discord (https://discord.com/invite/A3GvvMPDKg).

changelog.change_log:
[FEATURE]
- Pop-up notification added: Request for latest version update
- Information Board
- Meta Avatar Lipsync
- Update Motification System

[CHANGED]
- Board Tile Effect

[FIXED]
- Up to 8 people can connect at Community room

[New]
- Party room update
- Community room update

[Feature]
- Menu & Game UI
- Party System

[Deprecated]
- Stackup: Scheduled to change to a new game

Making or Joining Party for play with friends
-You can choose quick matching or join party to play board&casual games.
🔥Create a party and invite friends or Join party using a four-digit invitation code.
🔥Meta account avatar support: Show off your unique style with your Meta account avatar!
🔥Party Room, Community Room are add.
- Party Room: This dedicated space lets you hang out with your friends before diving into a game. Use voice chat to discuss and pick the perfect game for your party.
- Community Room: Up to 8 players can gather and play! Play with interactive props, score goals at basketball games, or challenge your friends to play darts.

- Fixed Bug
 1) Stackup
 2) Othello
 3) Rummy
 4) Ginrummy
 5) Omok

Hot Fix!!🔥
Fixed the problem of disconnection when using the Quest Party Chat function

------------------------------
긴급 수정🔥
퀘스트 파티챗 기능을 사용하면 접속이 끊기는 현상을 수정하였습니다.

Hot Fix!!🔥
Fixed a multiplayer matching error.
----------------
긴급 수정🔥
멀티플레이 매칭 오류를 수정하였습니다.
